biography: Arun Singh is an Indian politician who holds the positions of National General Secretary and Headquarter In-charge of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Singh is currently serving his second term as a Member of Parliament in the Rajya Sabha. Singh has discharged responsibilities as BJP's State Incharge of various states, including Andhra Pradesh, Rajasthan, Karnataka, Odisha, Jharkhand and Ladakh.
